SEARCH
Package example.app.entities.compartments

Class Batch

java.lang.Object
example.app.entities.compartments.Batch
public class Batch extends Object

Class Batch

A Batch represent a batch of a course. Every batch has an UUID, a name, a course, a description, a start date and an end date, a duration of days, a creation date and list of faculties assigned to it. The id is assigned automatically and cannot be changed later.
